Module storeFront.java
Package app

Class Store

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.Store
  • public class Store
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Store()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void browseListener​(Cart cart, java.util.ArrayList<Product> store, Inventory inventory)
      browseListener takes in input for a selected item and adds it to the cart if the player has enough gold
      static void cancelListener​(Inventory inventory, Cart cart, java.util.ArrayList<Product> store)
      cancelListener semi-recursively keeps the player within the options loop to remove an item from their cart until the 'q' button is pushed.
      static void checkoutListener​(Cart cart, java.util.ArrayList<Product> store, Inventory inventory)
      checkoutListener gets the total price for the player's cart, making sure that they can afford their whole cart then allows the purchase, exchanging the items for gold.
      static void clearScreen()
      pseudo-clearScreen.
      static void displayMenus​(Inventory inventory, java.lang.String menuSelection, java.util.ArrayList<Product> store, Cart cart)
      based on menuSelection, sets and displays menu options, then calls helper functions to listen for responses to the menu options given, then appropriately handle them
      static void displaySalables​(Inventory inventory, Cart cart, java.util.ArrayList<Product> store, java.lang.String mode)
      displaySalables pulls relevant information from player inventory/cart or store to display the correct options in order to place items in the cart, complete a sale from the cart, sell items back to the store, or remove items from the cart
      static java.util.ArrayList<Product> init()
      initializes and returns the store to the caller
      static void listener​(Inventory inventory, Cart cart, java.util.ArrayList<Product> store, java.util.Scanner scan)
      listener waits for input and directs the player to the correct menu based on their input
      static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)  
      static void placeInCart​(Inventory inventory, Cart cart, java.util.ArrayList<Product> store, java.util.Scanner scan)
      takes in input as a selection then adds the selected item to the cart if the player can afford to purchase the item
      static void setQuantity​(Product product, int quantity)
      sets quantity of a given item to a set quantity
      java.lang.String toString()
      custom toString that should print store contents with a new line character between each element

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

      • checkoutListener

        public static void checkoutListener​(Cart cart,
                                    java.util.ArrayList<Product> store,
                                    Inventory inventory)
        checkoutListener gets the total price for the player's cart, making sure that they can afford their whole cart then allows the purchase, exchanging the items for gold.

      • cancelListener

        public static void cancelListener​(Inventory inventory,
                                  Cart cart,
                                  java.util.ArrayList<Product> store)
        cancelListener semi-recursively keeps the player within the options loop to remove an item from their cart until the 'q' button is pushed. It will display relevant output for which items are removed from the cart to the player
        Parameters:
        inventory -
        cart -
        store -
